channel.title: How Do I make people Admins On PVPscape?!?!?
channel.description: Please help me out, What do I go to, to make people admins on pvp scape? Also, Im using pvp scape and want my Ip for when people log onto it shownomercy.no-ip.info. but I can only get in from 127.0.0.1 How can I change it? ive got an account on no-ip.com and registered it. now what? someone told me keep playin on 127.0.0.1 and advertise shownomercy.no-ip.info. that makes no sence :confused: :confused: :confused: please help with either or both :(

item.title: How Do I make people Admins On PVPscape?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

go in client.java and hit ctrl+h now a top type lothy and at botom type your name

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make people Admins On PVPscape?!?!?

item.title: How Do I make people Admins On PVPscape?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Typh Typh
item.description:
@Typh wrote:

Yet in PVPScape, you can just type in ::giveadmin playernamehere
And thats how everyone does it in pvpscape.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make people Admins On PVPscape?!?!?

item.title: How Do I make people Admins On PVPscape?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

good concept but go into your client.java and hit CTRL+F and search for lothy, everytime you find it replace it with your username

also if you dont want to make them admin ingame open charecters and find there username change character-rights = 0 to

character-rights = 1 for moderator

character-rights = 2 for admin

character-rights = 3 for owner

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make people Admins On PVPscape?!?!?

item.title: How Do I make people Admins On PVPscape?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Typh Typh
item.description:
@Typh wrote:

Ok, 127.0.0.1 is the one YOU use, the over people use shownomercy.no-ip.info. Also, in PVPscape, are you the owner? with player rights 3? And in client java, have you made all the lothyâ€™s into your name on there? If you have done both, then just type
::giveadmin playernamehere
Like, for me to a friend, i would use
::giveadmin hot girl
Thats how you do it.
Also, you could play on the shownomercy.no-ip.org as the ip, but its just a waste of time typing it in, when you could be in ur server.

-Typh
ps. I hope i Helped!

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make people Admins On PVPscape?!?!?
